description:
More than FREE.
1. Post / delete comments
2. Set Favorite photos
3. Share Photo via Email
4. Fullscreen view
5. Download large size photos
6. Search by keywords
* One more most important thing. (Drop me an email to get the features you want. PRO user can add features to the backlog with high priority) 

Thanks for your feedbacks.
For downloaded photos, you can get them in built-in app Photo. You can also set photo as the wallpaper there.
 
This is a PRO version for Flickr AIR. 
Features in 1.0.3
Add
1. Search by keywords

Features in 1.0.2
Add
1. Share photo via Email

Features in 1.0.0
Add 
1. Set favorite photos
2. Post/Delete comments 

Features in 0.9.0
Add
1. image view and save photo function
2. previous and next buttons for detail page

Coming soon....
1. put description and tags

If you use flickr a lot or you want to share your photos via your mobile device. The Flickr AIR PRO is your best choice. Share this app to your friends. (please send an email to ceflash@gmail.com after your purchase)  
The PRO and FREE have different road map in order to benefit more people. 
You could also try the easy and simple version below.
Try the free version. http://developer.palm.com/appredirect/?packageid=com.aowork.flickr.free
